skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Lady’s Mantle
skillTree.description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.

skillTree.name: Winds of Time
skillTree.description: Sometimes it's possible to bend time.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.name: Magic Stability
skillTree.description: Only few casters are able to stabilize winds of magic.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Sacred Water
skillTree.description: Their armour and mounts drip with sacred water, protecting the Lost Sons from mundane weaponry.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Years of Rage
skillTree.description: The Lost Sons are sent to battle under only the most dire of circumstances. Their fury against the despoilers of Bretonnia is limitless.

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Light of Battle"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Light of Battle Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Light of Battle Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Harmonic Convergence"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Earth Blood
skillTree.description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Earth Blood"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pha's Protection"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pha's Protection Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pha's Protection Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Inviolable
skillTree.description: Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.

skillTree.name: Sons of Bretonnia
skillTree.description: The Lost Sons were taken from birth by the Fay Enchantress, and schooled in the arcane as well as the martial arts.

skillTree.name: Organized
skillTree.description: The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of the Ideal
backgroundSkills.description: This Knight's skill, prowess, and finesse with blade and lance are beyond compare; his bravery, horsemanship, and chivalry above all others.

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Duty
backgroundSkills.description: Most loyal of Companions, this Knight fights always at the side of his Liege.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for Knight units
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of the Impetuous Knight
backgroundSkills.description: In the glory of the charge is this Knight most alive, ever in the forefront of battle.

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Audacity
backgroundSkills.description: A master of the feint and riposte, this Knight's skill at turning an enemy's strength against them is legendary.

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of the Joust
backgroundSkills.description: So great is this Knight's skill with a lance that none can unhorse them.

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Confidence
backgroundSkills.description: Haughty, proud, and skilful, this Knight never takes a backward step in the face of adversity.

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Stoicism
backgroundSkills.description: Steeled by this Knight's bravery, those around them fight with the courage of the Breton himself.

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Knightly Temper
backgroundSkills.description: With a heart of stone and resolute temper this Knight stands unbowed, spilling the foe's blood with each sweep and thrust.

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Heroism
backgroundSkills.description: Unbending even in the face of the greatest beasts, this Knight mounts their heads on the wall of his feasting chamber.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Penitent
backgroundSkills.description: A hermit-Knight, this one nevertheless always returns to fight for his beloved king.

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Noble Disdain
backgroundSkills.description: This Knight has great contempt for those who eschew the martial values of meeting one's opponent face to face.

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Discipline
backgroundSkills.description: No matter the odds, this Knight takes to the field utterly undaunted by the numberless hordes of his enemies.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Knights of the Realm units
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +5 for Knight of the Realm units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +5 for Knights of the Realm units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Empathy
backgroundSkills.description: A champion of the common man, Martrud was beloved by those he protected. Wherever he fought, the peasants doubled their efforts and would fight to the death rather than dishonor their lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for non-Knight units
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +5 for Peasant units
	(all units in army)

Upkeep: -10% for non-Knight units
	(all units in army)
